name: YTK-Association-digital-tool-UX
description:
YTK association required a digital tool that helps them to invite more students to learn about their student membership, leave their contact information, and increase the register volume.

YTK cannot provide any personnel to operate with the digital tool, nor big budget for a giant expensive machine. Therefore, this digital tool should be simple to invest, to operate, to use, and can work independently.


This portfolio showcases how I and my other 2 team members brainstorm from the business requirements into goals, scenarios, journeys, and to a wireframe.


This project outcome got positive feedback from both YTK and our lecturer.
